title: Club Tycoon: Idle Clicker
description: Club Tycoon: Idle Clicker is a clicker game where you will manage your own club. Do some clicks to earn money, upgrade abilities to increase efficiency, defend your club from zombie attacks, get resources, and become a club tycoon! With the combination of idle clicker and defense elements, this game will make you highly addicted to it. Your goal is to reach a specific number of dancers and defeat the final boss! Try to complete the game in the shortest time. Good luck, newbie capitalist!
